Reviews.Title: Sucks!
Reviews.Author: polly
Reviews.Content: This item is awful! It lasted one week and stopped holding its charge! This is the worst way I could of wasted my $$

Reviews.Title: the bluetooth earpiece  works just fine.
Reviews.Author: pilot0.25mm
Reviews.Content: The bluetooth earpiece Works Just fine..try it you'll be amazed ..works as it promised very handy and light weight !

Reviews.Title: needs volume button
Reviews.Author: alicia
Reviews.Content: The only thing I dont like Is the volume is low and ive turned my volume on my phone all the way up in still barely can hear

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Allana "Allana"
Reviews.Content: Although I could not get this headet to pair with my device, I must say that I am mighty impressed and pleased with the quality and level of excellent customer service and feedback received from vendor.  They provided assistance in helping me to pair the headset and when all attempts failed, I promptly received a refund.
